title: iMac 27 2011 - Screen flickering
message:
Hello!

I replaced the GPU card on this Imac because of distorted video issue. 
It came back 3 days after with another issue. The screen is flickering, the computer is still on, you can still hear the audio, no freeze, after some flickers it came back ok. 

Any idea?

Thanks

title: iMac 27 2011 - Screen flickering
message:
Backlight flickers, or image too?
Check image on external monitor.

title: iMac 27 2011 - Screen flickering
message: Only backlight, I can see the image with a flashlight

title: iMac 27 2011 - Screen flickering
message: You should discard the LCD first.
